result.arabic_text: ۞ إِنَّمَا يَسۡتَجِيبُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَسۡمَعُونَۘ وَٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ يَبۡعَثُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ثُمَّ إِلَيۡهِ يُرۡجَعُونَ
result.translation: (36) Only those who hear will respond. But the dead[301] - Allāh will resurrect them; then to Him they will be returned.
result.footnotes: [301]- i.e., the dead of heart, meaning the disbelievers.
